subdisciplines.name: Plant anatomy and morphology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the structure and form of plants.

subdisciplines.name: Plant physiology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the normal functioning of plants.

subdisciplines.name: Plant taxonomy
subdisciplines.description: The identification, classification, and naming of plants.

subdisciplines.name: Plant ecology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the interrelationships between plants and their environment.

subdisciplines.name: Plant genetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the genetic makeup of plants.
